statements: SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, account_number FROM customers WHERE contribution_amount > 1000.00
SELECT customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT account_number, contribution_amount FROM customers ORDER BY contribution_amount ASC
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, account_number, contribution_amount FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, account_number, contribution_amount FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE contribution_amount > 5000;
SELECT customer_name, account_number FROM customers WHERE contribution_amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, account_number, CONCAT('Amount: $', contribution_amount) AS formatted_amount FROM customers WHERE contribution_amount < 1000 ORDER BY contribution_amount DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_customers, AVG(contribution_amount) AS average_contribution FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(contribution_amount) FROM savings_plan GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(contribution_amount) AS total_contributions FROM savings_plan GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_contributions > 500;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(contribution_amount) FROM savings_plan GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, contribution_date FROM customers JOIN savings_plan ON customers.customer_id = savings_plan.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, contribution_amount FROM customers JOIN savings_plan ON customers.customer_id = savings_plan.customer_id WHERE contribution_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM Customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT plan_name, plan_type FROM SavingsPlans ORDER BY plan_type DESC;
SELECT customer_name, amount, contribution_date FROM Customers INNER JOIN Contributions ON Customers.customer_id = Contributions.customer_id WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(plan_id) AS num_plans FROM Contributions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_plans > 2;
SELECT * FROM Customers
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC
SELECT plan_name, plan_type FROM SavingsPlans WHERE plan_type='Basic'
SELECT customer_name, amount FROM Customers JOIN Contributions ON Customers.customer_id = Contributions.customer_id
SELECT * FROM Contributions ORDER BY contribution_date DESC
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT name, email FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT plan_name, plan_type FROM SavingsPlan ORDER BY plan_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, plan_id, amount FROM Contribution WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, last_interaction_date FROM CustomerNoContribution WHERE last_interaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT name, email FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT plan_name, plan_type FROM SavingsPlan ORDER BY plan_type DESC;
SELECT customer_id, plan_id, amount FROM Contribution WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY customer_id, amount DESC;

SELECT Customer.customer_id, name, email, last_interaction_date FROM Customer LEFT JOIN CustomerNoContribution ON Customer.customer_id = CustomerNoContribution.customer_id ORDER BY last_interaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, savings_plan_account_id FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM contributions WHERE contribution_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_type, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE savings_plan_account_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, contribution_amount FROM customers JOIN contributions ON customers.customer_id = contributions.customer_id;

SELECT customer_name, account_type, contribution_amount, transaction_type FROM customers JOIN contributions ON customers.customer_id = contributions.customer_id JOIN savings_plan_accounts ON customers.savings_plan_account_id = savings_plan_accounts.account_id JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM contributions WHERE contribution_amount > 1000);
